members.member:
A list base component for all the Syncfusion Blazor List dependant components to implement the common functionalities.
/// The generic type parameter.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.Internal.SfListBase`1.itemCreating
member.summary: ItemCreating event of the listbase which triggers before creating every item of the list.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.Internal.SfListBase`1.itemCreated
member.summary: ItemCreating event of the listbase which triggers after every item of the list created.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.Internal.SfListBase`1.ChildContent
member.summary: Update child content from parent component.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.Internal.SfListBase`1.OnInitialized
member.summary: Method invoked when the component is ready to start.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.Internal.CheckedItemDetails.ElementId
member.summary: It is used to denote checked Element id details.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.Internal.CheckedItemDetails.Key
member.summary: It is used to denote the datasource key.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.Internal.ListElementDetails`1
member.summary: Referring given li element data details.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.Internal.ListElementDetails`1.Child
member.summary: Denotes the nested child data of the list item.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.Internal.ListElementDetails`1.Id
member.summary: Denotes the id of the item element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.Internal.ListElementDetails`1.ItemData
member.summary: Denotes the data of the list item.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.Internal.ListElementDetails`1.ItemText
member.summary: Denotes the list item text.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.Internal.ListElementDetails`1.Index
member.summary: Denotes index of the list element.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ListViewEffect
member.summary: An enum type that denotes the animation effects of the ListView. Available options are as follows None, SlideLeft, SlideDown, Zoom, Fade.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ListViewEffect.None
member.summary: Navigation of the nested list item occurs with out any animation effect.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ListViewEffect.SlideLeft
member.summary: Navigation of the nested list item occurs with a slide left animation effect.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ListViewEffect.SlideDown
member.summary: Navigation of the nested list item occurs with a slide down animation effect.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ListViewEffect.Zoom
member.summary: Navigation of the nested list item occurs with a zooming animation effect.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ListViewEffect.Fade
member.summary: Navigation of the nested list item occurs with a fading animation effect.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.CheckBoxPosition
member.summary: An enum type that denotes the position of checkbox of the ListView. Available options are as follows Left and Right.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.CheckBoxPosition.Left
member.summary: Positions the checkbox to the left of the text content.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.CheckBoxPosition.Right
member.summary: Positions the checkbox to the right of the text content.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SortOrder
member.summary: An enum type that denotes the sort order of the ListView. Available options are as follows None, Ascending, Descending.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SortOrder.None
member.summary: The list view items will be displayed without performing any sorting.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SortOrder.Ascending
member.summary: Sorts the list view items will be displayed in the ascending order.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SortOrder.Descending
member.summary: Sorts the list view items will be displayed in the descending order.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ClickEventArgs`1
member.summary: A class that contains event arguments for click action.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ClickEventArgs`1.ItemData
member.summary: Gets or sets the data source of the clicked item.
member.value: The data of the clicked item. The default value is null.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ClickEventArgs`1.Name
member.summary: Gets the event name.
member.value: Accepts the string value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ClickEventArgs`1.IsChecked
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the element is checked or not.
member.value: true, if the element is checked. Otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ClickEventArgs`1.Index
member.summary: Gets the index position of clicked element.
member.value: Accepts an integer value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ClickEventArgs`1.IsInteracted
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the event is triggered by user interaction.
member.value: true, if the event was triggered by user interaction. Otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ClickEventArgs`1.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the selected item text.
member.value: Accepts the string value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ClickEventArgs`1.Cancel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to prevent the current click action on the list item.
member.value: true, if the click must be cancelled. Otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ClickEventArgs`1.Level
member.summary: Gets or sets the nesting level of the list items.
member.value: Accepts an integer value.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.BackEventArgs`1
member.summary: A class that contains event arguments for back action.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.BackEventArgs`1.IsInteracted
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the event is triggered by user interaction.
member.value: true, if the event has triggered by user interaction. Otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.BackEventArgs`1.Level
member.summary: Gets or sets the nesting level of the list items.
member.value: Accepts an integer value.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ActionEventsArgs
member.summary: A class that holds action event arguments.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ActionEventsArgs.Count
member.summary: Gets or sets the total number of records.
member.value: Accepts the double value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ActionEventsArgs.Name
member.summary: Gets whether the event name is 'ActionBegin' or 'ActionComplete'.
member.value: Accepts the string value.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ActionFailureEventsArgs
member.summary: A class that contains event arguments for action failure.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ActionFailureEventsArgs.Error
member.summary: Gets or sets the exception error associated with the event.
member.value: An Exception object representing the exception error.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.AnimationSettings
member.summary: A class that holds animation settings.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.AnimationSettings.Duration
member.summary: Gets or sets the time duration of transform object.
member.value: If we set the duration value, then the content transforms with in specified duration otherwise the default duration value 400 is set.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.AnimationSettings.Easing
member.summary: Gets or sets the easing effect applied while transform.
member.value: If we set the easing value, then the specified easing effect is applied for expand action otherwise the default easing value `ease` is set.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.AnimationSettings.Effect
member.summary: Gets or sets the effect which is shown in sub list transform.
member.value: One of the enumeration. The default value is SlideLeft

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SelectedItems`1
member.summary: A class that holds list selected item.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SelectedItems`1.Data
member.summary: Gets or sets the selected item dataSource collection.

member.remarks: You can identify that an action is completed and perform required operations.

member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised when the data fetch request from the remote server fails.

member.remarks: You can capture the failure and display the error based on your scenario.

member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised when a list item in the component is clicked.
member.value: An event callback function.
member.remarks: You can perform required action on list item click through this event.

member.summary: Gets or sets an event callback that is raised when the back icon is clicked in the nested list item.
member.value: An event callback function.
member.remarks: This event is used to trace the back button click in nested ListView and perform required actions.

member.value: The name of the field by which items are grouped.

member.value: The default value is `String.Empty`.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ListViewFieldSettings`1.IconCss
member.summary: Gets or sets the CSS to customize the icon for the list items dynamically.
member.value: The default value is `String.Empty`.
member.remarks: You can add a specific image to the icons using the `iconCss` property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.ListViewFieldSettings`1.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the id field mapped in data source.

member.summary: Gets or sets the text value from the data source for each list item.
member.value: The default value is `String.Empty`.

member.summary: Gets or sets the tooltip text that displays information about the target element when hovering over list items.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1
member.summary: The SfListView component displays data in an interactive hierarchical structure, offering various layouts and views. It provides features such as data-binding, templates, grouping,and virtualization.

example.code:
<SfListView DataSource="@Data">
             <ListViewFieldSettings TValue="DataModel" Id="Id" Text="Text"></ListViewFieldSettings>
            </SfListView>
             @code
            {
                 private DataModel[] Data =
               {
                    new DataModel { Text = "ArtWork", Id = "list-01" },
                    new DataModel { Text = "Abstract", Id = "list-02" },
                    new DataModel { Text = "Modern Painting", Id = "list-03" },
                    new DataModel { Text = "Ceramics", Id = "list-04" },
                    new DataModel { Text = "Animation Art", Id = "list-05" },
                    new DataModel { Text = "Oil Painting", Id = "list-06" }
                };
              public class DataModel
               {
                  public string Text { get; set; }
                  public string Id { get; set; }
                }
            }

member.summary: Component for executing complex list items common functionalities.
Configure member properties of the component.

The SfListView component displays data in an interactive hierarchical structure, offering various layouts and views. It provides features such as data-binding, templates, grouping, and virtualization.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.DataManager
member.summary: Creating instance of object of DataManager.

member.summary: Creating the element reference.

member.summary: Gets or sets the fast reflection accessor to reflect the data.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.PersistenceValues
member.summary: Referring the Persistence values.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.PersistenceValues.AllCheckedItems
member.summary: The `AllCheckedItems` property is used to set the list that need to be checked.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.PersistenceValues.CssClass
member.summary: The `CssClass` property is used to add a user-preferred class name in the root element of the ListView, using which we can customize the component (both CSS and functionality customization).

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.PersistenceValues.EnableRtl
member.summary: Enable or disable rendering component in right to left direction.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.PersistenceValues.Enable
member.summary: If `Enabled` set to true, the list items are enabled. And, we can disable the component using this property by setting its value as false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.PersistenceValues.SortOrder
member.summary: The `SortOrder` is used to sort the data source. The available type of sort orders are, `None` - The data source is not sorting. `Ascending` - The data source is sorting with ascending order. `Descending` - The data source is sorting with descending order.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.ID
member.summary: Gets or sets the element ID of the component.
member.value: Accepts the string value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.ChildContent
member.summary: Update child content from parent component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.Animation
member.summary: Gets or sets the `Animation` property, which allows you to apply various animations to the component. animations to the component.
member.value: Animation settings such as effect, duration and easing. The default value of enumeration is SlideLeft with duration as 400.

example.code:
<SfListView DataSource="@ListData" ShowHeader="true" HeaderTitle="Continent" Animation="ListAnimation">
             <ListViewFieldSettings TValue="DataModel" Id="Id" Text="Text" Child="Child"></ListViewFieldSettings>
            </SfListView>
             @code {
                List<DataModel> ListData = new List<DataModel>();
                public AnimationSettings ListAnimation { get; set; } = new AnimationSettings() { Effect = ListViewEffect.Zoom, Duration = 500, Easing = "ease" };
                protected override void OnInitialized()
               {
                       base.OnInitialized();
                       ListData.Add(new DataModel
               {
                   Text = "Asia",
                   Id = "01",
                   Category = "Continent",
                   Child = new List<DataModel>() {
                       new DataModel {
                           Text = "India",
                               Id = "1",
                               Category = "Asia",
                               Child = new List<DataModel> () {
                                   new DataModel {
                                       Id = "1001",
                                           Text = "Delhi",
                                           Category = "India"
                                   },
                                   new DataModel {
                                       Text = "Kashmir",
                                           Id = "1002",
                                           Category = "India"
                                   }
                               }
                       },
                       new DataModel {
                           Text = "China",
                               Id = "2",
                               Category = "Asia",
                               Child = new List<DataModel> () {
                                   new DataModel {
                                       Text = "Zhejiang",
                                           Id = "2001",
                                           Category = "China"
                                   }
                               }
                       }
                   }
               });
               ListData.Add(new DataModel
                   {
                   Text = "North America",
                   Id = "02",
                   Category = "Continent",
                   Child = new List<DataModel>() {
                       new DataModel {
                           Text = "USA",
                               Id = "3",
                               Category = "North America",
                               Child = new List<DataModel> () {
                                   new DataModel {
                                       Text = "New York",
                                           Id = "3002",
                                           Category = "USA"
                                   }
                               }
                       },
                       new DataModel {
                           Text = "Canada",
                               Id = "4",
                               Category = "North America",
                               Child = new List<DataModel> () {
                                   new DataModel {
                                       Text = "Alberta",
                                           Id = "4002",
                                           Category = "Canada"
                                   }
                               }
                       }
                   }
                 });
               }
              public class DataModel
               {
                 public string Id { get; set; }
                 public string Text { get; set; }
                 public string Category { get; set; }
                 public List<DataModel> Child { get; set; }
                   }
               }

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.CheckBoxPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the checkbox in a list item, as determined by the when is true.
member.value: The default value is Left , which will appear before the text content in a list item.

example.code:
<SfListView DataSource="@Data" ShowCheckBox="true" CheckBoxPosition="Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.CheckBoxPosition.Right">
             <ListViewFieldSettings TValue="DataModel" Id="Id" Text="Text"></ListViewFieldSettings>
            </SfListView>
             @code
            {
                 private DataModel[] Data =
               {
                    new DataModel { Text = "ArtWork", Id = "list-01" },
                    new DataModel { Text = "Abstract", Id = "list-02" },
                    new DataModel { Text = "Modern Painting", Id = "list-03" },
                    new DataModel { Text = "Ceramics", Id = "list-04" },
                    new DataModel { Text = "Animation Art", Id = "list-05" },
                    new DataModel { Text = "Oil Painting", Id = "list-06" }
                };
              public class DataModel
               {
                  public string Text { get; set; }
                    public string Id { get; set; }
                }
            }

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.CssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets a user-defined class name to apply to the root element of the component, allowing for customization of both CSS and functionality.
member.value: Accepts the CSS class string, separated by spaces, to customize the component's appearance. The default value is `String.Empty`.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.DataSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the data to be rendered in the component which is mapped with the fields of ListView.
member.remarks: Use this property to set the data source for the ListView. This property expects an IEnumerable of TValue, where TValue represents the type of the data object. To consume data from a remote services, use the component.

example.code:
<SfListView DataSource="@Data">
             <ListViewFieldSettings TValue="DataModel" Id="Id" Text="Text"></ListViewFieldSettings>
            </SfListView>
             @code
            {
                 private DataModel[] Data =
               {
                    new DataModel { Text = "ArtWork", Id = "list-01" },
                    new DataModel { Text = "Abstract", Id = "list-02" },
                    new DataModel { Text = "Modern Painting", Id = "list-03" },
                    new DataModel { Text = "Ceramics", Id = "list-04" },
                    new DataModel { Text = "Animation Art", Id = "list-05" },
                    new DataModel { Text = "Oil Painting", Id = "list-06" }
                 };
                 public class DataModel
               {
                  public string Text { get; set; }
                    public string Id { get; set; }
                }
            }

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.ListDataSource
member.summary: This dataSource property is used for internal functionalities.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.CheckedItems
member.summary: The `CheckedItems` property is used to set the item that need to be checked or get the details of items that are currently checked in the ListView component. The `CheckedItems` property depends upon the value of `showCheckBox` property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the component must be enabled.
member.value: true, to allow users to interact with component. Otherwise, false. The default value is true.
member.remarks: You can disable the component by setting this property value as false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.EnablePersistence
member.summary: Enable or disable persisting component's state between page reloads.
member.value: true, if the persistence can be enabled. Otherwise, false.
member.remarks: The checked items will be persisted when this property is set to true based on component unique id.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.EnableRtl
member.summary: Enable or disable rendering the component in right to left direction.
member.value: true, if the right to left direction can be enabled. Otherwise, false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.EnableVirtualization
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to enable virtualization in the component
member.value: true, if the virtualization can be enabled. Otherwise, false.
member.remarks: If this property is set to true, the ListViews performance will improve when loading a large amount of data.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.ListFields
member.summary: The `Fields` is used to map keys from the dataSource which extracts the appropriate data from the dataSource with specified mapped with the column fields to render the ListView.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.HeaderTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets the header title value of the component.
member.value: Accepts the string value. The default value is `String.Empty`.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.Height
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of the component.
member.value: Accepts the string value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.HtmlAttributes
member.summary: Gets or sets additional attributes, such as id, class, and more, in a key-value pair format.
member.value: A dictionary of additional HTML attributes for the root element of the component.

example.code:
<SfListView DataSource="@Data" HtmlAttributes="@(new() { { "style", "background:#cbe0f3;" } })">
             <ListViewFieldSettings TValue="DataModel" Id="Id" Text="Text"></ListViewFieldSettings>
            </SfListView>
             @code
            {
                 private DataModel[] Data =
               {
                    new DataModel { Text = "ArtWork", Id = "list-01" },
                    new DataModel { Text = "Abstract", Id = "list-02" },
                    new DataModel { Text = "Modern Painting", Id = "list-03" },
                    new DataModel { Text = "Ceramics", Id = "list-04" },
                    new DataModel { Text = "Animation Art", Id = "list-05" },
                    new DataModel { Text = "Oil Painting", Id = "list-06" }
                 };
                 public class DataModel
               {
                  public string Text { get; set; }
                    public string Id { get; set; }
                }
            }

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.Query
member.summary: Gets or sets the `Query` used to retrieve specific data from the data source by using the `where` and `select` keywords.
member.value: The query that utilizes the `where` and `select` keywords to filter and extract data.

example.code:
<SfListView HeaderTitle="Products" ShowHeader="true" TValue="DataModel" Query="@query">
              <ListViewFieldSettings TValue="DataModel" Id="ProductID" Text="ProductName"></ListViewFieldSettings>
              <SfDataManager Url="https://services.odata.org/V4/Northwind/Northwind.svc/" Adaptor="Adaptors.ODataV4Adaptor"></SfDataManager>
            </SfListView>
             @code
            {
               Syncfusion.Blazor.Data.Query query = new Query().From("Products").Select(new List<string>() { "ProductID", "ProductName" }).Take(10);    
               public class DataModel
               {
                    public int ProductID { get; set; }
                    public string ProductName { get; set; }
                }
            }

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.ShowCheckBox
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the checkbox will be displayed or hidden in the component.
member.value: true, if the checkbox should be displayed. Otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.ShowHeader
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the header of the component will be displayed or hidden.
member.value: true, if the header should be displayed. Otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.ShowIcon
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the list item's icon should be displayed or hidden.
member.value: true, if the icon should be displayed. Otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.SortOrder
member.summary: Gets or sets the sorting order for arranging list items. The available type of sort orders are, `None` - The data source will not be sorted. `Ascending` - The data source will be sorted in ascending order. `Descending` - The data source will be sorted in descending order.
member.value: The default value is None.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the component.
member.value: Accepts the string value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.GroupTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the customised template design as a and assigns it to the group headers of the component.
member.value: The default value is null.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.HeaderTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the customised design content as a of header title.
member.value: A template content that defines the appearance of the list header. The default value is null.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.Template
member.summary: Gets or sets the customised design content as a of individual list items.
member.value: A template content that defines the appearance of list item. The default value is null.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.DisableItemAsync(`0)
member.summary: Disables list items by specifying the Id and text fields. Use `listItem` with fields like TValue { fieldName: fieldValue }.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.EnableItemAsync(`0)
member.summary: Enables previously disabled list items by specifying the Id and text fields. Use `listItem` with fields like TValue { fieldName: fieldValue }.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.GetSelectedItem
member.summary: Gets the details of the currently selected item from the list items.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.GetCheckedItemsAsync
member.summary: Retrieves information about the currently checked item from the list of items.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.Remove(`0)
member.summary: Remove Element from datasource based on given item details element like fields: TValue { fieldName: fieldValue }.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.RemoveItems(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{`0})
member.summary: Removes item(s) from the ListView by providing an array of field objects. Use the `listItems` parameter with fields like TValue { fieldName: fieldValue }.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.CheckItemsAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{`0})
member.summary: Check items in the ListView You can check specific list items by providing field-value pairs or check all items by passing an empty argument.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Lists.SfListView`1.UncheckItemsAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{`0})
member.summary: Unchecks items in the ListView. You can uncheck specific list items by providing field-value pairs or uncheck all items by passing an empty argument.
